data.title: ETOILE LABRINE HOTEL I LA DIGUE I SEYCHELLES
data.meta_description:
Etoile Labrine is situated at L'union, currently with 8 bedrooms attached bathroom and patio.
we have 4 chalets, each having 2 bedrooms each.
data.text:
Etoile Labrine is a new establishment on La Digue island. La Digue being the 4th largest island is very popular for its well known beaches such as Anse Source d’Argent, Grand Anse and Anse Marron.

Situated at L’Union, Etoile Labrine is the nearest guest house to the famous Anse Source d’Argent beach. Our establishment comprises of 4 chalets located in a beautiful tropical garden. The chalets have 10 spacious rooms in total, whereby we offer 2 family units, each boasts 2 bedrooms with interconnecting doors. All rooms are equipped with an aircon & ceiling fan, they have a patio and a private bathroom each.

Etoile Labrine has a restaurant attached, serving breakfast and dinner. The restaurant is very famous for its typically Creole Cuisine, mainly fresh fish (Fish Curry) and seafood dishes, like the well known Octopus Curry. All dishes are served with local fruits and vegetables, produced from its own garden.

You can book fishing trips and boat excursions on the last remained La Digue’s sailing vessel “Labrine” to different islands, like Curieuse, Aride, Cousin & Cousine, Felicité, the famous Ile Coco and Sisters Islands.

Sunset Cruises and snorkeling trips to the nicest spots in the Indian Ocean can be done as well.

Etoile Labrine is a perfect location for honeymooners and couples wishing to get married. Weddings can be organized either on the beach or in the garden restaurant.

To explore the beauty of La Digue Island guided tours to secluded spots like Anse Marron, Anse Coco and other beaches are organized by the guest house.

As the main means of transport on La Digue is the traditional bicycle, rentals can be arranged at the reception.
